body_html: There are problems with GCC 5 and especially libstdc++-5-dev packages in Ubuntu 17.10 and newer related to bad build from Ubuntu. This won't be fixed as gcc 5 is considered deprecated. You can try compile gcc 5 / libstdc++ 5 from source if you need to use gcc 5. Unfortunately Ubuntu will not fix this issue. #5229 has more info why this happens.
body_text: There are problems with GCC 5 and especially libstdc++-5-dev packages in Ubuntu 17.10 and newer related to bad build from Ubuntu. This won't be fixed as gcc 5 is considered deprecated. You can try compile gcc 5 / libstdc++ 5 from source if you need to use gcc 5. Unfortunately Ubuntu will not fix this issue. #5229 has more info why this happens.
body: There are problems with ``GCC 5`` and especially ``libstdc++-5-dev`` packages in Ubuntu 17.10 and newer related to bad build from Ubuntu. This won't be fixed as gcc 5 is considered deprecated. You can try compile gcc 5 / libstdc++ 5 from source if you need to use gcc 5. Unfortunately Ubuntu will not fix this issue. #5229 has more info why this happens.
